column6: "IF THIS BE MY DESTINY-!" Spider-Girl learns the fate Norman Osborn planned for his grandson when she finally uncovers the secret of the woman who claims to be Normie's wife. Plus - at long last - Normie chooses between Raptor and Spider-Girl!
column8: | inker:Sal Buscema | writer:Tom DeFalco | penciller (cover):Ron Frenz | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | penciller:Patrick Olliffe | letterer:Dave Sharpe
